name: Polf
description:
Polf is a golf game, which takes place on a pool table. But your tools you're using to get the ball to the hole are very out of place. Use a brick or a hammer to shoot the ball, or you can even use balls, ramps or dominoes to achieve your goal.

The game progresses as you complete more levels, you got to play with more and more weird stuff. At the start it's just regular billiards with a golf ball and a stick, but the next time there's a brick on the table. Later you can shoot with golf balls, and than you have ramps to get across obstacles. From level 41 you can even play with dominoes.

Controls:

You can play polf by using just your mouse:

  • Click and drag on an object to shoot it
  • You can cancel the shooting by right clicking
  • You can navigate in the level selector with the mouse scrollwheel
  • You can move the camera with the scrollwheel, and move with the middle mouse button
  • Right click in your inventory to select an item and right click again to place it
  • You can rotate objects with the mouse scrollwheel

Keyboard controls:

  • In the level selector you can navigate with A/D ant the arrows
  • You can press R to restart the level
  • You can press Esc to exit a level, or go back to the title screen if you're in the level selection
